object.name: inputMessageEntityMentionName
object.description: Message entity that can be used to create a user user mention: received mentions use the messageEntityMentionName constructor, instead.

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: Offset of message entity within message (in UTF-8 codepoints)

arguments.name: length
arguments.description: Length of message entity within message (in UTF-8 codepoints)

arguments.name: userId
arguments.description: Identifier of the user that was mentioned
